% ENVIRONMENT CONFIGURATION
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

% Theorems
\theoremstyle{plain}
\newtheorem{theorem}{Teorema}[chapter]
\newtheorem{axiom}[theorem]{Axioma}
\newtheorem{proposition}[theorem]{Proposición}
\newtheorem{corollary}[theorem]{Corolario}

\theoremstyle{remark}
\newtheorem*{remark}{Remark}
\newtheorem*{example}{Ejemplo}

% Marked theorem
\newcommand{\newmarkedtheorem}[1]{%
  \newenvironment{#1}
    {\renewcommand{\qedsymbol}{$\square$}%
    \pushQED{\qed}\csname inner@#1\endcsname}
    {\popQED\csname endinner@#1\endcsname}%
  \newtheorem{inner@#1}%
}

\theoremstyle{definition}
\newmarkedtheorem{definition}[theorem]{Definición}

% New proof environment
\expandafter\let\expandafter\oldproof\csname\string\proof\endcsname
\let\oldendproof\endproof
\renewenvironment{proof}[1][Demostración]{%
	\oldproof[\itshape#1]%
	}{\oldendproof}

% Tables configuration (tabular)
\newcolumntype{C}[1]{%
	>{\vbox to 3ex\bgroup\vfill\centering}%
	m{#1}%
	<{\egroup}} 
\newcolumntype{D}{ >{\centering\arraybackslash} m{30pt} }

% Box
\newcommand{\boxx}[1]{\begin{center}\fbox{\begin{minipage}{0.85\textwidth}#1\end{minipage}}\end{center}}

% Equation environment
\setcounter{MaxMatrixCols}{30}
